title: Member Preview: THINKING OF YOU. I MEAN ME. I MEAN YOU.
hero_caption: Barbara Kruger. Thinking of You. I Mean Me. I Mean You., 2019 © Barbara Kruger. Digital image courtesy of the artist.
short_description: Enjoy two full days of member-only access to THINKING OF YOU. I MEAN ME. I MEAN YOU. before the exhibition opens to the public.
list_description: Enjoy two full days of member-only access to THINKING OF YOU. I MEAN ME. I MEAN YOU. before the exhibition opens to the public.
description:
Enjoy two full days of member-only access to THINKING OF YOU. I MEAN ME. I MEAN YOU. before the exhibition opens to the public.

Simply show your member card or digital card to enter.

Not yet a member? Become one today to enjoy the exhibition ahead of the crowds.

This exhibition is organized by the Art Institute of Chicago, the Los Angeles County Museum of Art, and The Museum of Modern Art, New York.
location: Regenstein Hall, Griffin Court, and various museum locations
